Subscription.Description: Provides activity related to accounts logging in and out, including local and remote events.
Subscription.Query:
<QueryList>
<!-- Collect Logons. For more details including LogonType mappings see: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/device-security/auditing/event-4624 --> <Query Id="0" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security"> *[System[(EventID=4624)]] and ( *[EventData[(Data[@Name='LogonType'] ='2')]] or <!-- For remote logon events filter out Local System, Local Service and Network Service accounts --> (*[EventData[(Data[@Name='LogonType'] ='3')]] and *[EventData[(Data[@Name='TargetUserSid']!='S-1-5-18')]] and *[EventData[(Data[@Name='TargetUserSid']!='S-1-5-19')]] and *[EventData[(Data[@Name!='TargetUserSid']!='S-1-5-20')]]) or *[EventData[(Data[@Name='LogonType'] ='8')]] or *[EventData[(Data[@Name='LogonType'] ='9')]] or *[EventData[(Data[@Name='LogonType'] ='10')]] or *[EventData[(Data[@Name='LogonType'] ='11')]] ) </Select>
<Suppress Path="Security"> *[EventData[(Data[@Name='TargetUserSid']='S-1-5-7')]] or <!-- Filter out anonymous logons --> *[EventData[(Data[@Name='AuthenticationPackageName']='Kerberos')]] <!-- Filter Kerberos usage by default. This may miss activity but reduces noise significantly. --> </Suppress> </Query>
<!-- Collect failed logons --> <Query Id="1" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security"> *[System[(EventID=4625)]] </Select> <Suppress Path="Security"> *[EventData[(Data[@Name='Status']='0xC0000133')]] <!-- filter out a time sync errors --> </Suppress> </Query>
<!-- Collect account logoffs --> <Query Id="2" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security"> *[System[(EventID=4634)]] and ( *[EventData[(Data[@Name='LogonType'] ='2')]] or <!-- Don't collect Network logoffs, since we cannot filter this effectively --> *[EventData[(Data[@Name='LogonType'] ='8')]] or *[EventData[(Data[@Name='LogonType'] ='9')]] or *[EventData[(Data[@Name='LogonType'] ='10')]] or *[EventData[(Data[@Name='LogonType'] ='11')]] ) </Select> <Suppress Path="Security"> *[EventData[(Data[@Name='TargetUserSid'] = 'S-1-5-18')]] or *[EventData[(Data[@Name='TargetDomainName'] = 'Window Manager')]] </Suppress> </Query>
<!-- Collect use of explict credentials while filtering out common events --> <Query Id="3" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security"> *[System[(EventID=4648)]] </Select> <Suppress Path="Security"> <!-- Paths may need updating depending on configuration. --> *[EventData[(Data[@Name='ProcessName'] = 'C:\Windows\System32\taskhost.exe')]] or *[EventData[(Data[@Name='ProcessName'] = 'C:\Windows\System32\svchost.exe')]] or *[EventData[(Data[@Name='ProcessName'] = 'C:\Windows\System32\lsass.exe')]] or *[EventData[(Data[@Name='ProcessName'] = 'C:\Windows\System32\inetsrv\w3wp.exe.exe')]] or *[EventData[(Data[@Name='ProcessName'] = 'C:\Windows\System32\winlogon.exe')]] or *[EventData[(Data[@Name='ProcessName'] = 'C:\Windows\System32\services.exe')]] </Suppress> </Query>
</QueryList>
